Articles.Content:
Just thought I'd share this for the Star Wars fans around here who have small kids. There was a story on the CBC this morning about a new Star Wars kids book series illustrated with felt figurines called [Cozy Classics: Star Wars](http://www.mycozyclassics.com/star-wars/). I mention it because the artwork looks very well done.

![Star-Wars-Epic-Yarns-The-Empire-Strikes-Back-Jack-and-Holman-Wang.jpg](http://www.mycozyclassics.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Star-Wars-Epic-Yarns-The-Empire-Strikes-Back-Jack-and-Holman-Wang.jpg)
